00018 /*
00019  * DocumentReader.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *  Created on: 7 May, 2009
00023  *      
00024  */
00025 
00026 #ifndef DOCUMENTREADER_H_
00027 #define DOCUMENTREADER_H_
00028 
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include "google/protobuf/message.h"
00031 #include "constants.h"
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace LDA;
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * Wrapper around protobuf messages for convenient
00038  * reading of words, topics & (word,index) pairs
00039  * from word, topic, dictionary dump files respectively.
00040  * Assumes that each msg is in a binary file in record* format
00041  * where record=(size of serialized msg,msg serialized as string)
00042  */
00043 class DocumentReader {
00044 public:
00045     DocumentReader(string w_fname_);
00046     virtual ~DocumentReader();
00047 
00048     int read(google::protobuf::Message* msg);
00049 
00050 private:
00051 
00052     string w_fname; //The input file to read various msgs from
00053 
00054     ifstream w_input; //The input stream to read from w_fname
00055 
00056     char* c_size; //Array to store size of serialized msg
00057     char* c_msg; //Array to store the serialized msg
00058 
00059     /**
00060      * The main function that reads records from input and stores them c_size & c_msg
00061      * fname is used for logging
00062      */
00063     inline int read_sized_record_from(ifstream& input, string fname)
00064             throw (int) {
00065         if (input.read(c_size, sizeof(size_int)).eof()) {
00066             LOG_IF(FATAL,input.bad())<< "Unable to read from input file: " <<fname;
00067             throw -1;
00068         }
00069         size_int size = *(size_int*)c_size;
00070         LOG_IF(FATAL,size>=MAX_MSG_SIZE) << "Reading input from " << fname << "Message size " << size << " exceeds " << MAX_MSG_SIZE << ". Quitting...";
00071 
00072         input.read(c_msg,size);
00073         return size;
00074     }
00075 
00076     /**
00077      *  The base method to read into msg from inp_str
00078      *  inp_fname is used for logging
00079      */
00080     inline void read_base(ifstream& inp_str, string& inp_fname, google::protobuf::Message* msg) throw(int) {
00081         size_int size = read_sized_record_from(inp_str, inp_fname);
00082         string str_message(c_msg, size);
00083         msg->Clear();
00084         msg->ParseFromString(str_message);
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif /* DOCUMENTREADER_H_ */
